parameters: "A surge of vitality courses through your veins, rejuvenating your body."
"A refreshing wave of energy washes over you, revitalizing your stamina."
"A cache of ammunition materializes before you, restocking your arsenal."
"Munition Talisman : Increase Ammo Gained From Parry"
"Your precise parrying strikes now yield a bountiful harvest of ammunition."
"The essence of the raven imbues you with swift reflexes, granting heightened evasion."
"The power of explosive potential surges within your weapon, increasing its lethal force."
"Your equipment magically expands, allowing for a larger magazine capacity."
"A newfound resilience pulsates within you, fortifying your very core."
"As you consume the mysterious stew, your stamina reserves expand, defying fatigue."
"The severed arm grants you an unholy strength, enhancing the force of your melee strikes."
"Your feet feel lighter as if propelled by an unseen force, allowing you to move with newfound swiftness."
"Each shot now releases a flurry of malevolent projectiles, spreading chaos among your enemies."
"The witch's remedy infuses you with heightened efficiency, ensuring your stamina is utilized to its fullest potential."
"The bony finger of a lich grants you accelerated stamina regeneration, bringing vitality to your weary body."
"As you gaze through the sinister eyeballs, your vision sharpens, allowing you to perceive lurking dangers."

events.comment: Set Camera Constraint For Map Feature
Patching Up Holes In Collision Mask And Editing Variable isExplored

parameters: "Ancient pedestals ascend from the ground, offering treasures of great might."
"A mysterious portal materializes, offering passage to uncharted depths."
"A foreboding portal emerges, a gateway to an ultimate showdown with a fearsome presence."

events.comment: *EDIT* Create object <EnemyName> at position EnemiesSpawner.CenterX();EnemiesSpawner.CenterY() *To Test New Enemies*
